Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Genetic mutations can be associated with various diseases, but without additional context, it's impossible to determine the specific diseases associated with these mutations. Therefore, I have listed the mutations as the "Disease" entities in the table.
